poem.title: In the Royal Palace at Luang Prabang
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Sitting for Ilya  Glazunov in 1967
The Queen of Lao has asked and answered the question
How many divisions does he have?

Was it she who was to die in a cave?
The new Lao royal ballerinas
Smile and demonstrate the safety procedures

To which an ancient singer
Keens an older coronach, and slips away,
Unmarked.
